task.title: Installing the plugin
task.shortdesc: There are two ways of installing the plugin: Via the plugin manager (a sort of app store for XD plugins integrated into XD) or from a .xdx file.

step.cmd: Install the plugin with one of the two methods:

chrow.chdesc: Recommended for most users. This enables automatic updates of the plugin and requires plugins (including this one) to undergo a review process for every published version, decreasing the possibility of malicious content. Follow the guide.
Only install .xdx files from sources you can trust.Useful for prerelease or customized versions of the plugin that don't get released in the plugin manager. Follow the guide.
